meanings.definition: キッチン（kitchenの非標準的な発音・綴り）
meanings.english_definition: Non-standard variant pronunciation/spelling of 'kitchen' (possibly dialectal or child speech)

examples.translation: ママがキッチンで料理してるよ

meanings.notes: This appears to be either ① a phonetic spelling representing dialectal/colloquial pronunciation, or ② a common misspelling by English learners. Standard form is always 'kitchen'.

etymology.value: Phonetic corruption of 'kitchen' (標準語のkitchenからの音声的変形). Possibly influenced by similar-sounding words like 'kitten'.

examples.note: 正式な綴りは常にkitchenです。kishenは誤記または方言形です

level_frequency.notes: This variant is not used in formal contexts and doesn't appear in standard dictionaries

readability_explanation.text: 「kishen」は標準英語の単語ではありません。正しい形は「kitchen（キッチン）」です。この綴り/発音を見かけた場合は、①子供の言葉遣い、②方言、③外国語話者の誤記のいずれかと考えられます
